Hakibuscon/Decadel

	Hakibuscon waited for an answer from this base out in the desert by the
Nile River of Egypt.  He hoped that they would accept his offer.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

	Decadel picked up a transmission from another bot just as he was about to
walk into the base.  He looked back and saw Hakibuscon.  He walked over to
Hakibuscon.

	"Listen you, this better not be a trick!  I will take you to the leader,
and she can listen to your deal!" He said as he grabbed Hakibuscon, and
walked into the base with his gun pointed at Hakibuscon's head.  He brought
Hakibuscon to where Blackarachnia was.

	"Your honor, I have brought this bot to you, he wants to make a deal with
us," Decadel said and shoved Hakibuscon towards Blackarachnia, then walked
off and tried to find Paralysis, so he could get assigned some quarters.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

	Hakibuscon looked at Blackarachnia.  He had seen her before, when he was
spying on a Predacon base.  Yes, these guys were Predacons alright.  He
stared at Blackarachnia, and tried to keep his fear hidden.

	"My name is Hakibuscon.  I have traveled far, and I need you to help me,
by sheltering me here.  Also, if you don't mind, could I have some
weaponry?  I lost all of my other weapons in a little accident.  If you do
this, I will help you fight against those idiotic Maximals you are trying
to destroy," He said, although doubted they'd let him stay, as Predacons
were cold-hearted.
